compound.name: Hanging Leg Raise
compound.description: The hanging leg raise is a compound exercise that targets the rectus abdominis and hip flexors.

compound.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
compound.description: The ab wheel rollout is a compound exercise that targets the rectus abdominis and obliques.

compound.name: Mountain Climbers
compound.description: Mountain climbers are a compound exercise that target the rectus abdominis, obliques, and hip flexors.

compound.name: Russian Twists
compound.description: Russian twists are a compound exercise that target the obliques and transversus abdominis.

compound.name: Burpees
compound.description: Burpees are a compound exercise that target the rectus abdominis, obliques, and hip flexors.

isolation.name: Crunches
isolation.description: Crunches are an isolation exercise that primarily target the rectus abdominis.

isolation.name: Leg Raises
isolation.description: Leg raises are an isolation exercise that primarily target the lower rectus abdominis and hip flexors.

isolation.name: Bicycle Crunches
isolation.description: Bicycle crunches are an isolation exercise that target the obliques and rectus abdominis.

isolation.name: Plank
isolation.description: The plank is an isolation exercise that targets the rectus abdominis, obliques, and transversus abdominis.

isolation.name: Flutter Kicks
isolation.description: Flutter kicks are an isolation exercise that primarily target the lower rectus abdominis and hip flexors.

compound.name: Military Press
compound.description: The military press is a compound exercise that primarily targets the deltoid muscles.

compound.name: Push Press
compound.description: The push press is a compound exercise that targets the deltoid muscles and triceps.

compound.name: Arnold Press
compound.description: The Arnold press is a compound exercise that targets all three heads of the deltoids.

compound.name: Clean and Press
compound.description: The clean and press is a compound exercise that targets the deltoid muscles, trapezius, and upper back.

compound.name: Handstand Push-Up
compound.description: The handstand push-up is a compound exercise that primarily targets the deltoid muscles and triceps.

isolation.name: Lateral Raises
isolation.description: Lateral raises are an isolation exercise that target the deltoid muscles.

isolation.name: Front Raises
isolation.description: Front raises are an isolation exercise that target the anterior deltoid.

isolation.name: Rear Delt Flyes
isolation.description: Rear delt flyes are an isolation exercise that target the posterior deltoid.

isolation.name: Reverse Pec Deck Flyes
isolation.description: Reverse pec deck flyes are an isolation exercise that target the posterior deltoid.

isolation.name: External Rotation
isolation.description: External rotation is an isolation exercise that targets the rotator cuff muscles, specifically the infraspinatus and teres minor.

compound.name: Squats
compound.description: Squats are a compound exercise that primarily targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

compound.name: Lunges
compound.description: Lunges are a compound exercise that target the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

compound.name: Leg Press
compound.description: The leg press is a compound exercise that primarily targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

compound.name: Step-Ups
compound.description: Step-ups are a compound exercise that target the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

isolation.name: Leg Curl
isolation.description: The leg curl is an isolation exercise that targets the hamstrings.

isolation.name: Leg Extension
isolation.description: The leg extension is an isolation exercise that primarily targets the quadriceps.

isolation.name: Calf Raises
isolation.description: Calf raises are an isolation exercise that primarily target the calves.

isolation.name: Hamstring Curl Machine
isolation.description: The hamstring curl machine is an isolation exercise that targets the hamstrings.

isolation.name: Seated Calf Raises
isolation.description: Seated calf raises are an isolation exercise that primarily target the calves.

compound.name: Bench Press
compound.description: The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the pectoralis major (upper, middle, and lower), deltoids, and triceps.

compound.name: Push-Ups
compound.description: Push-ups are a compound exercise that primarily target the pectoralis major (upper, middle, and lower), deltoids, and triceps.

compound.name: Incline Bench Press
compound.description: The incline bench press is a compound exercise that targets the upper portion of the pectoralis major, deltoids, and triceps.

compound.name: Decline Bench Press
compound.description: The decline bench press is a compound exercise that targets the lower portion of the pectoralis major, deltoids, and triceps.

isolation.name: Chest Flyes
isolation.description: Chest flyes are an isolation exercise that primarily target the pectoralis major (upper, middle, and lower).

isolation.name: Cable Crossover
isolation.description: The cable crossover is an isolation exercise that primarily targets the pectoralis major (upper, middle, and lower).

isolation.name: Dumbbell Flyes
isolation.description: Dumbbell flyes are an isolation exercise that primarily target the pectoralis major (upper, middle, and lower).

isolation.name: Machine Chest Press
isolation.description: The machine chest press is an isolation exercise that primarily targets the pectoralis major (upper, middle, and lower).

isolation.name: Pec Deck Machine
isolation.description: The pec deck machine is an isolation exercise that primarily targets the pectoralis major (upper, middle, and lower).
